text: Uye zivai kuti mukati menyu pane mutumwa waAllah. Akakutevedzerai pane zvizhinji (zvamunofunga nezvamunoda), zvirokwazvo muchava munopinda mukushungurudzika. Asi Allah vaita kuti muve munofarira kutenda uye vakakushongedza mumoyo yenyu, uye vakaita kuti muvenge kusatenda, nekupfurikidza mirairo, uye nekusateerera (Allah nemutumwa wavo (SAW)). Ava ndivo vari mugwara rakanaka
